db:info.db:title: Qt Quick TableView examples - Conway’s Game of Life

db:abstract.db:para: The Conway’s Game of Life example shows how the QML TableView type can be used to display a C++ model that the user can pan around.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += quick qml SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ gameoflifemodel.cpp
RESOURCES += \ main.qml \ gosperglidergun.cells
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/tableview/gameoflife INSTALLS += target
HEADERS += \ gameoflifemodel.h
